messages.content: Please turn off the lights in the garage tool room and also switch off the rear deck sensor.

__BEGIN_NUCORE_COMMAND__
{
  "device_id": "ZY143_252N003",
  "command_id": "DOF",
  "reasoning": "The user wants to turn off the garage tool room lights, so we use the DOF command for device ZY143_252N003."
}
__END_NUCORE_COMMAND__
__BEGIN_NUCORE_COMMAND__
{
  "device_id": "ZY089_251",
  "command_id": "DOF",
  "reasoning": "The user wants to turn off the rear deck sensor, so we use the DOF command for device ZY089_251."
}
__END_NUCORE_COMMAND__
Can you switch on the light in the tool room?

__BEGIN_NUCORE_COMMAND__
{
  "device_id": "ZY143_252N003",
  "command_id": "DON",
  "reasoning": "The user wants to switch on the tool room light, so we use the DON command for device ZY143_252N003."
}
__END_NUCORE_COMMAND__
Turn on the sensor and the tool room lights.
CLARIFY: Do you mean the rear deck sensor (ZY089_251) and the garage tool room lights (ZY143_252N003)?
